snippet.title: Anodyne 2: Return to Dust | Teaser Trailer | January 2019
snippet.description:
Shrink between surreal 3D worlds and microscopic, Zelda-like 2D levels in the follow-up to 2013's standout adventure RPG! Coming 2019.

Be sure to subscribe, like the video, and ask any questions you have!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/877810/Anodyne_2_Return_to_Dust/
Wishlist on Kartridge: https://www.kartridge.com/games/SeanHanTani/anodyne-2-return-to-dust
Wishlist on Itch.io: https://sean-han-tani.itch.io/anodyne-2
 
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/7snxjmj
Newsletter: https://analgesic.productions/

Follow the developers for more updates: https://twitter.com/sean_htch and https://twitter.com/even_kei

---

Play as Nova, the Nano Cleaner, who is tasked with collecting dangerous Nano Dust growing throughout New Theland, which then must be returned for recycling to a mysterious entity, only known as the Center.

Walk or ride across a lush, moody world in full 3D. Discover strange characters and places. Shrink into characters and collect Nano Dust through 2D, Zelda-like gameplay, reminiscent of the original Anodyne.

Similar to the Final Fantasy franchise, there's no need to play the original Anodyne to understand the story in Anodyne 2: Return to Dust, but longtime fans will find connections between the two! Discover the true nature of the Nano Dust, Nova, and The Center, in the latest game from Analgesic Productions!

Features:

-Run, jump and drive through 3D cities and natural landscapes, and find people who are infected with Nano Dust, and need to be cleaned. Then, shrink down into their bodies to enter surreal, 2D dungeons, where Nano Dust can be found!

 -While exploring 2D dungeons, use Nova's Nano Vacuum in 2D to solve puzzles and defeat enemies by sucking up and shooting objects. She'll also need the vacuum to collect Nano Dust and magical Cards scattered throughout the levels.

 -Use Nano Dust and Cards to unlock deeper reaches of Anodyne 2's world.

 -Follow the story of Nova as she learns more about who "The Center" is, talks to a variety of creatures and people, and eventually grows to understand her role in the world as a Nano Cleaner.

Anodyne 2 is being made by Sean Han Tani (coding, music, business, writing) and Marina Kittaka (art, story, lead writer). Both work on the game design.
